articles.author: Elaine Kurtenbach
articles.title: World stocks climb after Wall Street rallies on hopes for lower interest rates - AP News
articles.description: Shares in Europe and Asia have advanced after U.S. stocks rallied again on hopes the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates. U.S. futures and oil prices also were higher. South Korea's benchmark gained 2.5% while Tokyo's Nikkei 225 was up 1.7%. Japan's Kioxi…
articles.content:
BANGKOK (AP) Shares in Europe and Asia advanced on Wednesday after benchmarks on Wall Street surged on hopes the Federal Reserve will soon opt to cut interest rates.
